name: Icy Prison, Mass
book: Pathfinder Roleplaying Game: Ultimate Magic. © 2011, Paizo Publishing, LLC
target: one creature/level, no two of which can be more than 30 ft. apart.
text: This spell functions as icy prison, except as noted above.
target_zh: 目标          每等级一个生物，互相之间不超过30尺
text_zh: 这个法术工作方式如同冰封之牢 (Icy Prison)，除了上述部分。
